title: BRIEF-Broadcom Adjusts Offer For Qualcomm To $79 Per Qualcomm Share
text: 30 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Broadcom Adjusts Offer For Qualcomm To $79 Per Qualcomm Share Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - Broadcom Ltd: * BROADCOM ADJUSTS OFFER FOR QUALCOMM TO $79 PER QUALCOMM SHARE * BROADCOM SAYS ALL OTHER TERMS OF PROPOSED MERGER AGREEMENT WITH QUALCOMM REMAIN UNCHANGED * BROADCOM LTD - REAFFIRMS ITS COMMITMENT TO ACQUIRING QUALCOMM * BROADCOM - PREPARED TO BUY QUALCOMM FOR $79 PER QUALCOMM SHARE, CONSISTING OF $57 IN CASH AND $22 IN BROADCOM SHARES * BROADCOM -ADJUSTING QUALCOMM OFFER AFTER QUALCOMM BOARDâ€™S DECISION TO TRANSFER $4.10 PER QUALCOMM SHARE FROM QUALCOMM STOCKHOLDERS TO NXP STOCKHOLDERS * BROADCOM - LOOKS FORWARD TO CONCLUDING TRANSACTION WITH THIS QUALCOMM BOARD, OR NEWLY ELECTED QUALCOMM BOARD FOLLOWING ANNUAL MEETING ON MARCH 6, 2018 * BROADCOM - PROPOSED DEAL WOULD PROVIDE FOR AUTOMATIC INCREASE OF $3/QUALCOMM SHARE, OR TOTAL OF $82/SHARE, IF QUALCOMM UNABLE TO COMPLETE NXP DEAL * BROADCOM - POTENTIAL AUTOMATIC INCREASE OF $3/QUALCOMM SHARE, OR TOTAL OF $82/SHARE, WOULD EQUATE TO $60 IN CASH & $22 IN BROADCOM SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
